alert.note: Alert for Barren; Bullitt; Edmonson; Grayson; Green; Hardin; Hart; Larue; Meade; Metcalfe; Nelson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 8:01PM EDT until April 13 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Nelson County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Meade County in central Kentucky... Green County in central Kentucky... Larue County in central Kentucky... Hart County in central Kentucky... Eastern Grayson County in central Kentucky... Hardin County in central Kentucky... Southern Bullitt County in central Kentucky... Northern Barren County in south central Kentucky... Northwestern Metcalfe County in south central Kentucky... Eastern Edmonson County in south central Kentucky... * Until 845 PM EDT/745 PM CDT/. * At 801 PM EDT/701 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Elizabethtown to 11 miles east of Plum Springs, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Elizabethtown around 805 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Three Springs and Greensburg. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT/1000 PM CDT/ for south central and central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Barren; Bullitt; Edmonson; Grayson; Green; Hardin; Hart; Larue; Meade; Metcalfe; Nelson
